about_the_game:
💫 "Soul Fragments of the Stray Cat" | A Healing Cat Collection Journey in Another World 🐈 ⬛

🔥 92% Healing Rate Certification | 9 Magnificent Fantasy Realms | Infinite Cat Energy Supply

◤Developer's Meow◢

"Meowdis's lifespan formula? That guy can't even count salmon cans!"

▌Soul Healing Formula · Triple Gentle Critical Hit

✔ Nine Layers of Another World: Steampunk Cat Town × Star Sea Whale Island × Jade Mushroom Forest... Each scene is a wallpaper-level artwork

✔ Dynamic Emotional Branches: 27 exclusive NPC storylines, Vanishing Cards / Unreturnable Home / The Machine Doctor's Dream... Each soul hides tears and sugar

✔ Light and Dark Dual Play: Daytime Soul Fragment Search × Night Can Chase, satisfying both collectors and puzzle enthusiasts

✔ Easter Egg Radar Warning: Love Letters in the Wall Cracks × Time Capsules in the Tree Holes × Glowing Strange Toilets...

▌Thick Painting Aesthetic Revolution · Every Frame is a Sleep Aid

✧ Van Gogh's Sense of Color × Hayao Miyazaki's Soul: Using movie-level dynamic thick painting technology, clouds breathe / stars are touchable

✧ Healing Effect Engine: Cat Ear Shaking Physics Simulation 3.0, Can Opening Particle Effects MAX, NPC Smile Arc AI Calculation

⚠ Medical Warning: This game may cause

■ Late-night eye wetness (when the can search mode is one can short)

■ Screenshot key wear-out (triggered every 10 seconds with wallpaper-level scenes)

■ Reality distortion syndrome (trying to use the magnifying glass function on your own cat master)

▌Ultimate Cat Slave Simulator · Nine Lives Reincarnation Project

✦ [Soul Puzzle] Dance with the moonlight at the top of the whale bone church, collecting the last piece of memory shadow

✦ [Can Battle] Carry a lantern through the misty forest, awaken the sleeping fairy tale with the sound of cans

✦ [NPC Redemption Plan] High-five interaction with the socially anxious Mr. K, give a loving encouragement

▼Click to Heal▼

Start this wonderful journey that makes the Steam Deck emit the fragrance of cherry blossoms

#Healing System Bomb #Electronic Melatonin #Ultimate Form of Cloud Cat Petting

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.14+
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1Gb Video Memory, capable of OpenGL 3.0+ support (2.1 with ARB extensions acceptable)
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OSX 10.14+
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1Gb Video Memory, capable of OpenGL 3.0+ support (2.1 with ARB extensions acceptable)
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

movies.name: 《迷途猫的灵魂碎片》玩法展示

name: Stray of Lost Cat

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows XP,Vista,7,8/8.1,10
  • Processor: 2.0Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1Gb Video Memory,capable of OpenGL 3.0+support（2.1 with ARB extensions acceptable）
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows XP,Vista,7,8/8.1,10
  • Processor: 2.0Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1Gb Video Memory,capable of OpenGL 3.0+support（2.1 with ARB extensions acceptable）
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Welcome to "Stray of Lost Cat" ,where your mission is to save a cat with a peculiar personality. Learn how to deal with the suddenly appearing "Mischief," collect soul fragments scattered across different scenes, and embark on a relaxing and healing adventure~
